item.g:title: Action Camera Harness NDM 1 - M-XL
item.g:description:
The Action Camera Harness / NDM 1 can be used on our backpacks equipped with the No Dancing Monkey™ 1.0 and No Dancing Monkey™ 1.2 harnesses.This product is compatible with the following models:- MOTO Hydro
- MTB Hydro
- Airborne
- Ranger
- Vertical
- Patriot
- Outlander (Not compatible with Outlander PRO)

item.g:title: Airborne 3L Race Edition Hydration Pack - Gray
item.g:description: AIRBORNE 3L is an action bike backpack beyond anything else out there, full of high-performance features perfect for the mountainbike junkie. Here you get our award winning No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 4-point Suspension Harness that guarantees zero bouncing on your back, but still allows you to feel 100% free in action. This is every singletrack riders favorite: it’s superfast – except there’s no rocket engine included. Sorry, you’ll have to do the pedaling.Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented 4-point harness system for an absolute perfect fit with zero bounceMagnetic Tube Clip - Keeps your tube in a secure and accessible position at the front3L or 2L storage with the detachable multi pocket - Decide if you go light or superlight for the day
item.g:rich_text_description:
AIRBORNE 3L is an action bike backpack beyond anything else out there, full of high-performance features perfect for the mountainbike junkie. Here you get our award winning No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 4-point Suspension Harness that guarantees zero bouncing on your back, but still allows you to feel 100% free in action. This is every singletrack riders favorite: it’s superfast – except there’s no rocket engine included. Sorry, you’ll have to do the pedaling.

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented 4-point harness system for an absolute perfect fit with zero bounce
  • Magnetic Tube Clip - Keeps your tube in a secure and accessible position at the front
  • 3L or 2L storage with the detachable multi pocket - Decide if you go light or superlight for the day

item.g:title: Airborne 9L Race Edition Hydration Pack - Gray
item.g:description: This is probably THE perfect 9L daypack designed to carry your personal gear and hydration while you’re bombing the hills during the 1-day adventure or the gnarly enduro race. This mountainbike backpack is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 4-point harness system, which makes the pack stay snug on you with no bounce even in the most brutal of terrains. The pack will not make you less dirty (because that’s totally impossible) but it will make you enjoy the ride!Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented 4-point harness system for an absolute perfect fit with zero bounce3.0L/100oz Elite hydration Bladder - Keep your tube in a secure and accessible position9L storage - With several smart attachment points for your full-face helmet, knee and elbow pads.
item.g:rich_text_description: <p>This is probably THE perfect 9L daypack designed to carry your personal gear and hydration while you’re bombing the hills during the 1-day adventure or the gnarly enduro race. This mountainbike backpack is equipped with our bounce free<span> </span><strong>No Dancing Monkey™</strong><span> </span>(NDM) 4-point harness system, which makes the pack stay snug on you with no bounce even in the most brutal of terrains. The pack will not make you less dirty (because that’s totally impossible) but it will make you enjoy the ride!</p> <ul> <li> <strong>Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness</strong><span> </span>- Our patented 4-point harness system for an absolute perfect fit with zero bounce</li> <li> <strong>3.0L/100oz Elite hydration Bladder</strong><span> </span>- Keep your tube in a secure and accessible position</li> <li> <strong>9L storage</strong><span> </span>- With several smart attachment points for your full-face helmet, knee and elbow pads.</li> </ul>

item.g:title: Berg MTB Jersey Men - Black / XS
item.g:description: The Berg MTB Jersey with its drop tail design will be the perfect fit for any rider going full speed in an aggressive attack mode. The 4-way stretch will give you freedom of movement and the mesh sides will keep you cool so you can keep your speed up for the full session. The Outdoors Undefined Ikon combines the mountains and the forest, representing our playground, the outdoors. At the same time we call it undefined, as we as want to keep exploring new places and new ways. We made this jersey for this reason. Combine with the Skrubb MTB Pants or Skrubb MTB Shorts for a complete MTB gravity set.

item.g:title: Food Pouch Bikepacking Bag - Black
item.g:description: Use it for food, snacks or as an extra bike bottle holder.
item.g:rich_text_description: Use it for food, snacks or as an extra bike bottle holder.

item.g:title: Handlebar Accessory Bag Bikepacking Bag - Black
item.g:description: An easy access bag, using waterproof ripstop TPU. Mounted directly on your handlebars or as an accessory bag on top of the Handlebar Rolltop Bag - the choice is yours.
item.g:rich_text_description: An easy access bag, using waterproof ripstop TPU. Mounted directly on your handlebars or as an accessory bag on top of the Handlebar Rolltop Bag - the choice is yours.

item.g:title: Handlebar Roll-Top Bag + Holster Bikepacking Bag - Black
item.g:description: Attached to the handlebars with two elastic, rubber-like straps, inspired by Giant Loop (USWE's sister brand) motorcycle luggage and the world of bike packing nerds, to ensure the bag sits tight and secure and 10 spacers to be able to fit almost every bike. The kit comes with a roll top 2 side opening bag with an air valve for easy compression.
item.g:rich_text_description: Attached to the handlebars with two elastic, rubber-like straps, inspired by Giant Loop (USWE's sister brand) motorcycle luggage and the world of bike packing nerds, to ensure the bag sits tight and secure and 10 spacers to be able to fit almost every bike. The kit comes with a roll top 2 side opening bag with an air valve for easy compression.

item.g:title: Roll-Top Saddle Bag Bikepacking Bag - Black
item.g:description: Easy to fit, waterproof one-piece saddle bag that holds 8L of gear, compressible with an air valve.
item.g:rich_text_description: Easy to fit, waterproof one-piece saddle bag that holds 8L of gear, compressible with an air valve.

item.g:title: Tool Saddle Bag bikepacking bag - Black
item.g:description: Attaches to the saddle with oversized Velcro to keep it secure and bounce free without over design or complexity.
item.g:rich_text_description: Attaches to the saddle with oversized Velcro to keep it secure and bounce free without over design or complexity.

item.g:title: Frame Bag Large Bikepacking Bag - Black / Large
item.g:description: The aerodynamic design fits most frames and comes with three elastic rubber-like straps, inspired by Giant Loop (USWE sister brand) motorcycle luggage and the world of bike packing nerds, and three velcro straps, to ensure the bag sits tight and secure on the bike.

item.g:title: Camo 3/4 Jersey Men - Asphalt / XS
item.g:description: The CAMO ¾ looks and feels like a nice casual cotton tee but hidden beneath is a beast of an MTB performance jersey. The super-fast drying material (four times faster than cotton!) will keep you dry and comfortable both on and off the bike, while the low weight and stretch will make you able to perform on point.

item.g:title: Buddy 40L Athlete Gear Pack - Black
item.g:description:
The BUDDY 40L Athlete Gear Pack is the athletes best buddy when bringing gear for racing or training. Its ideal for the gym session, for cross-fit, for MTB training, for running sessions as well as it is perfect as a carry on bag when traveling. The separated lap-top compartment and the seven (7) different smart storage compartments makes it the only carry-on/gym-bag/training bag or go-to-work-bag needed. - Bounce free NDM™ 3.0 fixed harness system including attachment points (fits our click-on accessories).
- Seven smart and practical storage compartments.

item.g:title: Buddy 150L Athlete Gear Trolley Bag - Black
item.g:description: Storage is key when it comes to an athlete gear trolley bag, and the BUDDY 150L has plenty. There are four key compartments - a boot and knee brace pocket with a waterproof liner, padded helmet section, goggle vault, and a generously sized main compartment for multiple gear sets, protective equipment and gear to change into after the race.

item.g:title: Brant 35L Ski Touring Daypack - Men / Blue
item.g:description: The BRANT 35L SKI TOURING DAYPACK is the perfect choice for a pumped adventure where it’s an epic mix of uphill climbs and high flow descents. The pack is equipped with the bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 2.1 elastic harness system together with a hip-support, that guarantees that the pack provides a super solid and comfy fit in any terrain.Equipped with RECCOS/M size - Smaller frame design to fit women L/XL size - large frame design to fit MenZero bounce with NDM 2.1 – The No Dancing Monkey™ 2.1 harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.Anti Freeze - Thermo Cell insulation technology uses your body heat to protect the drinking tube from freezing.Be searchable - In case of avalanches and emergencies or if lost in the outdoors RECCO rescue reflectors make you searchable by organized rescue teams searching with RECCO detectors.
item.g:rich_text_description:
The BRANT 35L SKI TOURING DAYPACK is the perfect choice for a pumped adventure where it’s an epic mix of uphill climbs and high flow descents. The pack is equipped with the bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 2.1 elastic harness system together with a hip-support, that guarantees that the pack provides a super solid and comfy fit in any terrain.

Equipped with RECCO

  • S/M size - Smaller frame design to fit women
  • L/XL size - large frame design to fit Men
  • Zero bounce with NDM 2.1 – The No Dancing Monkey™ 2.1 harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.
  • Anti Freeze - Thermo Cell insulation technology uses your body heat to protect the drinking tube from freezing.
  • Be searchable - In case of avalanches and emergencies or if lost in the outdoors RECCO rescue reflectors make you searchable by organized rescue teams searching with RECCO detectors.

item.g:title: CARVE 16L Winter Daypack - Red
item.g:description: Have a smooth ride down the mountain wearing a backpack with zero bounce, using what we think is the best harness system ever made. It’s like wearing nothing at all! The CARVE 16 is a super dope winter daypack made for alpine ski, snowboard or snowmobile adventures with 16L of storage with room for a hydration bladder up to 3L in size.Zero bounce with NDM2.0 + Snug Me – The No Dancing Monkey™ 2.0 harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.Multi-adjustable back panel - Adjust the pack up and down to find the perfect fit.Carry your gear – Easy carry system for your snowboard or skis and loads of storage for both your gear and hydration bladder.

item.g:title: Rush 8L Bike Hydration Vest - Black / S
item.g:description: The RUSH 8 is a technical high-performance vest developed for Mountainbike and Gravel riders that need quick and safe access to nutrition and personal gear while in action. The vest is equipped with our bounce free NDM Vest technology that offers an outstanding individual form-fit together with elastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit. It’s equipped with the NDM Buckle for a smooth and secure one-hand operation while wearing gloves. NDM Vest technology - elastic side panels - expand along with the chest NDM Buckle - smooth and secure one-hand operation while wearing gloves5x Quick access front pockets for nutrition, phone and other personal essentials Main compartment - compression sleeve for hydration and extra layers2,0L hydration bladder with plug-n-play tube coupling includedLower back - zippered mesh pocket for spare tubes, bike tools and other essentials Reflective points - front and back - bike LED-light attachment point
item.g:rich_text_description:
The RUSH 8 is a technical high-performance vest developed for Mountainbike and Gravel riders that need quick and safe access to nutrition and personal gear while in action. The vest is equipped with our bounce free NDM Vest technology that offers an outstanding individual form-fit together with elastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit. It’s equipped with the NDM Buckle for a smooth and secure one-hand operation while wearing gloves. 

  • NDM Vest technology - elastic side panels - expand along with the chest 
  • NDM Buckle - smooth and secure one-hand operation while wearing gloves
  • 5x Quick access front pockets for nutrition, phone and other personal essentials 
  • Main compartment - compression sleeve for hydration and extra layers
  • 2,0L hydration bladder with plug-n-play tube coupling included
  • Lower back - zippered mesh pocket for spare tubes, bike tools and other essentials 
  • Reflective points - front and back - bike LED-light attachment point

item.g:title: MTB Hydro 9L Hydration Pack - Black
item.g:description: This is the hydration backpack designed for the performance minded MTB or gravel cyclist who’s searching for a premium bike backpack that will carry a bit more than just hydration. The pack is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 1.2 harness system, with integrated elastic straps that allow freedom to breathe and move in action. Zero bounce with NDM 1.2 harness – our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspensionNDM Buckle – Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit3,0L / 100oz Elite™ hydration bladder with plug-n-play coupling included
item.g:rich_text_description:
This is the hydration backpack designed for the performance minded MTB or gravel cyclist who’s searching for a premium bike backpack that will carry a bit more than just hydration. The pack is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 1.2 harness system, with integrated elastic straps that allow freedom to breathe and move in action. 

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.2 harness – our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension
  • NDM Buckle – Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit
  • 3,0L / 100oz Elite™ hydration bladder with plug-n-play coupling included

item.g:title: Race 2.0 2L Hydration Pack - White
item.g:description: We changed the game of MTB race hydration, and now we are taking it to the next level with the Race 2.0 2L hydration pack. Built and improved upon our previous race pack, the Race 2.0 is our lightest creation yet, offering unbeatable ventilation and a kick-ass way of keeping your hydration cool.Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 1.0 PRO - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspensionUltra Lightweight - Clocking in at a minimal 230g 2.0L / 70oz Elite - Hydration Bladder included

item.g:title: Outlander PRO 2L Hydration Pack - Black
item.g:description: The OUTLANDER PRO is a super light race hydration pack developed and designed for MTB marathon athletes and weekend warriors. It has conquered the Absa Cape Epic and are currently exploring the world of Gravel Racing. The pack is being stripped off to go minimum on weight and to maximize the ventilation at the front. We’re using an ultralight mesh-membrane harness with fixed size to make this happen. This is a Factory Racing pack!Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 1.0 PRO - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspensionOnly the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible with a slick 2L hydration pack2.0L / 70oz Elite - Hydration Bladder included
item.g:rich_text_description:
The OUTLANDER PRO is a super light race hydration pack developed and designed for MTB marathon athletes and weekend warriors. It has conquered the Absa Cape Epic and are currently exploring the world of Gravel Racing. The pack is being stripped off to go minimum on weight and to maximize the ventilation at the front. We’re using an ultralight mesh-membrane harness with fixed size to make this happen. This is a Factory Racing pack!

  • Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 1.0 PRO - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension
  • Only the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible with a slick 2L hydration pack
  • 2.0L / 70oz Elite - Hydration Bladder included

item.g:title: ZULO 2L Hydration Waist Pack - Black
item.g:description:
ZULO 2 is a special designed race hydration waist pack providing the perfect ergonomic fit on your hip. With its banana-shape and single-buckle secure suspension strap, the belt will be fixed on your waist without cramping your style and performance. It’s equipped with a 1.0L/35oz Elite bladder with Plug-N-Play coupling, magnetic clip for the drink tube, smart multi organizer pocket and two quick stash side pockets for quick access to energy gels and food.Single-buckle secure suspension strap- Won't affect balance (or style) by staying compressed and snug to your body
1.0L Elite Hydration Bladder - with magnetic clip for the drinking tubeVentilated back panel - better airflow

ZULO 2 is a special designed race hydration waist pack providing the perfect ergonomic fit on your hip. With its banana-shape and single-buckle secure suspension strap, the belt will be fixed on your waist without cramping your style and performance. It’s equipped with a 1.0L/35oz Elite bladder with Plug-N-Play coupling, magnetic clip for the drink tube, smart multi organizer pocket and two quick stash side pockets for quick access to energy gels and food.

  • Single-buckle secure suspension strap
  • Won't affect balance (or style) by staying compressed and snug to your body
  • 1.0L Elite Hydration Bladder - with magnetic clip for the drinking tube
  • Ventilated back panel - better airflow

item.g:title: PACE 2L Trail Running Vest - Red / S
item.g:description:
The PACE 2 running hydration vest has an ergonomic design and size range that takes this vest to the top level. It’s a lightweight vest with an outstanding personal fit delivered by the bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ Vest system and the elastic side panels.Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vestNDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fitPerfect Fit- Elastic side panels with adjustable draw strings that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit- No sweat with the super ventilated mesh back panel
Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks
item.g:rich_text_description:
The PACE 2 running hydration vest has an ergonomic design and size range that takes this vest to the top level. It’s a lightweight vest with an outstanding personal fit delivered by the bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ Vest system and the elastic side panels.

  • Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vest
  • NDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit
  • Perfect Fit- Elastic side panels with adjustable draw strings that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit
  • No sweat with the super ventilated mesh back panel
  • Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks

item.g:title: PACE 14L Trail Running Vest - Red / S
item.g:description: The PACE 14L is the trail running vest developed to challenge the big ultras offering supreme front and rear accessibility while in action. The body of this lightweight vest is built from the original No Dancing Monkey™ Vest technology including the elastic side panels that makes the vest bounce free and secure even in the most gnarly terrain.Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vestElastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit.Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks (included), plus room for large 2.0L hydration bladder in the back.A large total capacity of 14L with a compartment on the back.
item.g:rich_text_description:
The PACE 14L is the trail running vest developed to challenge the big ultras offering supreme front and rear accessibility while in action. The body of this lightweight vest is built from the original No Dancing Monkey™ Vest technology including the elastic side panels that makes the vest bounce free and secure even in the most gnarly terrain.

  • Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vest
  • Elastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit.
  • Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks (included), plus room for large 2.0L hydration bladder in the back.
  • A large total capacity of 14L with a compartment on the back.

item.g:rich_text_description:
The PACE 14L is the trail running vest developed to challenge the big ultras offering supreme front and rear accessibility while in action. The body of this lightweight vest is built from the original No Dancing Monkey™ Vest technology including the elastic side panels that makes the vest bounce free and secure even in the most gnarly terrain.

  • Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vest
  • Elastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit.
  • Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks (included), plus room for large 2.0L hydration bladder in the back.
  • A large total capacity of 14L with a compartment on the back.

item.g:title: OUTLANDER 3L Hydration Pack - Crazy Yellow
item.g:description: OUTLANDER 3 is a lightweight race 3L hydration backpack with a super smart external on/off organizer pocket for tools and gear. This unique on/off solution makes it possible for you to strip off the pocket and go superlight (2L) when you’re in that race mode. Fitted with the award winning No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point harness that makes the pack 100% bounce free in action.Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspensionOnly the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible with a slick 3L hydration packDetachable Multi Pocket - Decide if you go light or superlight for the day.
item.g:rich_text_description:
OUTLANDER 3 is a lightweight race 3L hydration backpack with a super smart external on/off organizer pocket for tools and gear. This unique on/off solution makes it possible for you to strip off the pocket and go superlight (2L) when you’re in that race mode. Fitted with the award winning No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point harness that makes the pack 100% bounce free in action.

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension
  • Only the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible with a slick 3L hydration pack
  • Detachable Multi Pocket - Decide if you go light or superlight for the day.

item.g:title: OUTLANDER 4L Hydration Pack - Crazy Yellow
item.g:description: This is the slim king of hydration backpacks that carries a big tanker of hydration for the extreme races. The OUTLANDER 4 is geared-up with a 3.0 liter Elite hydration bladder with a Slide-Seal top for easier filling. The pack is designed with our award winning No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point harness system that almost glues the pack on your back and makes it 100% bounce free in action.Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension3.0L / 100 oz Elite™ - Hydration bladder included with fixed coupling
item.g:rich_text_description: <p>This is the slim king of hydration backpacks that carries a big tanker of hydration for the extreme races. The<span> </span><strong>OUTLANDER 4</strong><span> </span>is geared-up with a 3.0 liter Elite hydration bladder with a Slide-Seal top for easier filling. The pack is designed with our award winning<span> </span><strong>No Dancing Monkey™</strong><span> </span>4-point harness system that almost glues the pack on your back and makes it 100% bounce free in action.</p> <ul> <li> <strong>Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness</strong><span> </span>- Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension</li> <li> <strong>3.0L / 100 oz Elite™</strong><span> </span>- Hydration bladder included with fixed coupling</li> </ul>

item.g:title: OUTLANDER 4L Hydration Pack - Black
item.g:description: This is the slim king of hydration backpacks that carries a big tanker of hydration for the extreme races. item.g:rich_text_description:
This is the slim king of hydration backpacks that carries a big tanker of hydration for the extreme races. The OUTLANDER 4 is geared-up with a 3.0 liter Elite hydration bladder with a Slide-Seal top for easier filling. The pack is designed with our award winning No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point harness system that almost glues the pack on your back and makes it 100% bounce free in action.

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension
  • 3.0L / 100 oz Elite™ - Hydration bladder included with fixed coupling

item.g:title: OUTLANDER 3L Small Hydration Pack
item.g:description: The OUTLANDER 3L JR is a mountain bike backpack designed for pro riders going superlight at marathon distances. But honestly, the hydration pack will fit any rider perfectly who’s searching for a badass backpack with hydration that won’t cramp you balance or style. This pack is a racer and we guarantee you will love it, no matter if you are a pro or a happy amateur rider.Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspensionOnly the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible with a slick 3L hydration packDetachable Multi Pocket - Decide if you go light or superlight for the day.Extra small - The harness on this model is extra small (76 - 102cm / 29 - 40" chest circumference)-
item.g:rich_text_description:
The OUTLANDER 3L JR is a mountain bike backpack designed for pro riders going superlight at marathon distances. But honestly, the hydration pack will fit any rider perfectly who’s searching for a badass backpack with hydration that won’t cramp you balance or style. This pack is a racer and we guarantee you will love it, no matter if you are a pro or a happy amateur rider.

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension
  • Only the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible with a slick 3L hydration pack
  • Detachable Multi Pocket - Decide if you go light or superlight for the day.
  • Extra small - The harness on this model is extra small (76 - 102cm / 29 - 40" chest circumference)

item.g:title: PATRIOT 15L MTB Protector Pack - Gray
item.g:description: This bounce free MTB back protector backpack is made for the adrenaline junkie. The PATRIOT 15 protects both your back and your gear when bombing the steepest hills or shredding the roughest terrain. This bike backpack gives you total confidence with the removable multi-compliant CE-certified SAS-TEC central back protector (SC-1/CB52) made of flexible viscoelastic foam with memory effect that returns to its original shape after impact or deformation.Zero bounce - With our patented award winning NDM 4-point harness system.Stay protected - Worry less about falling over and more about how to gain speed with the removable Lev.1CE-Certified by SAS-TEC full back protector, designed to protect and to stay put on your back in high-speed action.
item.g:rich_text_description:
This bounce free MTB back protector backpack is made for the adrenaline junkie. The PATRIOT 15 protects both your back and your gear when bombing the steepest hills or shredding the roughest terrain. This bike backpack gives you total confidence with the removable multi-compliant CE-certified SAS-TEC central back protector (SC-1/CB52) made of flexible viscoelastic foam with memory effect that returns to its original shape after impact or deformation.

  • Zero bounce - With our patented award winning NDM 4-point harness system.
  • Stay protected - Worry less about falling over and more about how to gain speed with the removable Lev.1CE-Certified by SAS-TEC full back protector, designed to protect and to stay put on your back in high-speed action.

item.g:description: The Puls trail running shorts comes in a minimalist design with the focus to keep you distraction free on your great ultra running adventures. The soft elastic waistband gives the shorts a snug fit, and features small mesh pockets suitable for gels. The back is equipped with a zippered pocket for your personal "get away car” if things get messy (ie. your credit card or car keys). These shorts don't have any inner mesh construction at all. They are truly minimalistic.

item.g:title: Puls Trail Running Tank Men - Men / Black / XS
item.g:description: When you are going full speed on the trails, with full focus on your great ultra running adventure, you need your gear to be reliable the whole way through. The Minimalistic design of the Puls Trail Running Tank is super lightweight, durable and has the moisture wicking and breathability to keep your focus on moving forward.

item.g:title: Dimma Trail Running Shirt Men - Men / Red / XS
item.g:description: The feel of a truly lightweight tee is unbeatable. That’s why we designed this shirt to be as light as fog, hence the name DIMMA (in Swedish it means just that, fog). The pattern takes its inspiration from early morning runs when the fog lies thick, and you’re out giving it all. The Dimma Trail Running Shirt also has the matching DIMMA Trail Running Shorts, making it a complete trail running kit.

item.g:title: Dimma Trail Running Shorts Men - Men / Red / XS
item.g:description: The DIMMA shorts are a super lightweight pair of shorts with built in tights. The tights are super thin with a comfortable feel, making the shorts truly lightweight, quick drying and with minimal risk of chafing. Truly made with long trail running in mind, where you need your gear to be top notch. the name DIMMA means fog in Swedish as the pattern takes its inspiration from early morning runs when the fog lies thick, and you’re out giving it all. The Dimma Trail Running Shorts also has the matching DIMMA Trail Running shirt, making it a complete trail running kit.

Truly made with long trail running in mind, where you need your gear to be top notch. the name DIMMA means fog in Swedish as the pattern takes its inspiration from early morning runs when the fog lies thick, and you’re out giving it all. The Dimma Trail Running Shorts also has the matching DIMMA Trail Running shirt, making it a complete trail running kit.

item.g:title: Luftig MTB Jersey Men - Men / Black / XS
item.g:description: When we designed the high-performance Luftig MTB Jersey, our focus was to provide a jerseys that would have unbeatable breathability. Trust us when we say that this Jersey really hit the spot, our promise to you is that this jersey will keep you cool the whole day filled with high-speed MTB gravity sessions. It has such an amazing breezy feel to it that we even decided to name it “LUFTIG”, Swedish for “airy”.

item.g:title: Skrubb MTB Pants Men - Men / Gray / XS
item.g:description: When you are riding in fast and gnarly terrain, we know your pants needs to be able to take a beating while being comfortable enough to be worn for a full day of riding. That’s why we designed the The Skrubb MTB Pants with all of this in mind, to be able to provide what we think is the absolute perfect MTB Pants. We printed "Anything but Mainstream" on the back, because that's exactly what they are.

That’s why we designed the The Skrubb MTB Pants with all of this in mind, to be able to provide what we think is the absolute perfect MTB Pants. We printed "Anything but Mainstream" on the back, because that's exactly what they are.

item.g:description: The Waterproof Jacket will be your best friend on the days when battling bad weather and gnarly terrain. With this jacket you will stay dry and keep the fighting spirit up during long and challenging MTB rides, gravel rides or when fast packing on foot.

item.g:title: Wind Vest Men - Men / Gray / XS
item.g:description: When we designed the Wind Vest our vision was something reliable during fast racing and hard XC MTB or gravel training. Something that would keep out the wind out and protect you from getting wet without making you overheat when going full-speed. What we came up with really hit the mark.

item.g:title: Wind Jacket Men - Men / Black / XS
item.g:description: When we designed the Wind Jacket, we knew a true gravel and XC MTB jacket must be breathable and easily packable. The jacket needs to endure any long riders while protecting you against any weather nature can throw at you. And believe us when we say, the Wind Jacket cut no corners.
item.g:rich_text_description: When we designed the Wind Jacket, we knew a true gravel and XC MTB jacket must be breathable and easily packable. item.g:title: Vent Gravel Jersey Men - Men / Gray / XS
item.g:description: Our plan was to create a jersey so breathable and ventilated that it would blow your mind, specifically designed for super warm and long gravel or XC MTB rides. What we came up with is what you are looking at right now, the VENT gravel jersey. The most ventilated jersey you ever tried on, hence the name.

item.g:title: Totem Tee Men - Men / Black / XS
item.g:description: The TOTEM TEE is a casual looking jersey with hidden tech features that will make you look fast and dressed both on and off the trails. Made of a premium quick drying material, 4-times quicker than cotton. Designed with functionalities for both mountain biking, gravel riding and trail running.

item.g:title: Skarp Gravel BIB Shorts Men - Men / Black / XS
item.g:description: The Skarp bib shorts are specifically designed for high-speed XC mountainbike and gravel riding. Its design for a faster positioning on the bike that keeps the experienced rider comfortable all the way to the finish line. When this product was tested by our testing crew they were totally blown away saying things like ”This is by far the best bib shorts I have ever ridden”. Combine the Skarp bib shorts with he Skarp Jersey for a 100% race look and feel.

item.g:title: Grus Gravel Jersey Men - Men / White / XS
item.g:description: The Grus Jersey is made for the fast trails and long gravel roads. The short sleeves with the folded hems and a cut and fit designed for the more upright position makes it ideal for gravel and MTB riding. The design emphasizes the USWE brand as well as the ikons printed tone in tone on the sleeves. The Grus jersey can be combined with any shorts, but matches best with the Grus bib shorts or the Skarp bib shorts.

item.g:title: Grus Gravel Bib Shorts Men - Men / Black / XS
item.g:description: The GRUS bib shorts are specifically designed for mountainbike marathon and gravel riding. The uneven terrain increases the risk of chafing, and the more upright position (compared to road cycling) demands other qualities of the bibs. We covered all this in the GRUS bibs and made them perfect for ”grus", which means gravel in Swedish. The Grus Bib shorts can be combined with any jersey, but matches best with the Grus Jersey or the Skarp Jersey.
item.g:rich_text_description: <p>The GRUS bib shorts are specifically designed for mountainbike marathon and gravel riding. The uneven terrain increases the risk of chafing, and the more upright position (compared to road cycling) demands other qualities of the bibs. We covered all this in the GRUS bibs and made them perfect for ”grus", which means gravel in Swedish. The Grus Bib shorts can be combined with any jersey, but matches best with the Grus Jersey or the Skarp Jersey.</p>

item.g:title: Kalk Off-Road Jersey - Red / XS
item.g:description: When designing the KALK Off-road Jersey we wanted to provide the most unbeatable lightweight high performance jersey possible. We think we nailed it. When putting it on you will immediately feel it, the comfort of the bonded cuffs and hems together with the low weight will be a game changer.

item.g:title: Kalk Cartoon Off-Road Pant - Red / 28
item.g:description: We designed the KALK pants to have the absolute best ventilation you can get, with a cut and stretch designed for fast racing. They are super lightweight, breathable, and have fast-drying materials to keep them feeling breezy and light after hours of riding. Cut large on the knees to accommodate knee pads or knee braces and four-way stretch panels for freedom of movement. Rip-stop nylon high-abrasion seat panels keep you protected from wear. Full-grain leather inner knee panels provide optimal protection and durability.

They are super lightweight, breathable, and have fast-drying materials to keep them feeling breezy and light after hours of riding. Cut large on the knees to accommodate knee pads or knee braces and four-way stretch panels for freedom of movement. Rip-stop nylon high-abrasion seat panels keep you protected from wear. Full-grain leather inner knee panels provide optimal protection and durability. </p>

item.g:title: Cartoon Off-Road Gloves - Red / S
item.g:description:
Superlight PerformanceThe Cartoon Glove is a super light “second skin” Off-Road glove, made to challenge high-performance racing. It comes with an ergonomic pre curved palm to prevent bunching and is fully perforated to allow for max air flow. This glove has media friendly stitching on thumb and fingertips for touchscreens. Embossed ergonomically shaped cuff with Velcro adjustment to always keep the gloves securely in place. Mesh panels between fingers aid airflow, with Spandex mesh back of hand fabric that gives protection and freedom of movement at all times. Why its kicks assA true performance racing glove, that feels like a second skin. Made from the ground up for fast paced racing.Highlights:- High-performance Off-Road Glove
- Pre-curved ergonomic second skin fit
- Spandex back of hand fabric
- Stretch AX Synthetic suede perforated palm for maximum dexterity on your control
- Silicon printed palm details for extra grip
- Sculpted embossed neoprene cuff to seal the gloves from debris
- Lycra thumb and back of hand expander guarantee freedom of movement at all times
- Adjustable Velcro closure cuff with TPR grip detail
- Reinforced finger tips and thumb patches for extra durability in high stress areas
- Media friendly stitching on thumb and forefinger So you can use your phone without taking off your gloves

- Reinforced finger tips and thumb patches for extra durability in high stress areas
- Media friendly stitching on thumb and forefinger So you can use your phone without taking off your gloves

item.g:rich_text_description:
Superlight Performance

The Cartoon Glove is a super light “second skin” Off-Road glove, made to challenge high-performance racing. It comes with an ergonomic pre curved palm to prevent bunching and is fully perforated to allow for max air flow. This glove has media friendly stitching on thumb and fingertips for touchscreens. Embossed ergonomically shaped cuff with Velcro adjustment to always keep the gloves securely in place. Mesh panels between fingers aid airflow, with Spandex mesh back of hand fabric that gives protection and freedom of movement at all times. 

Why its kicks ass

A true performance racing glove, that feels like a second skin. Made from the ground up for fast paced racing.

Highlights:

  • High-performance Off-Road Glove
  • Pre-curved ergonomic second skin fit
  • Spandex back of hand fabric
  • Stretch AX Synthetic suede perforated palm for maximum dexterity on your control
  • Silicon printed palm details for extra grip
  • Sculpted embossed neoprene cuff to seal the gloves from debris
  • Lycra thumb and back of hand expander guarantee freedom of movement at all times
  • Adjustable Velcro closure cuff with TPR grip detail
  • Reinforced finger tips and thumb patches for extra durability in high stress areas
  • Media friendly stitching on thumb and forefinger So you can use your phone without taking off your gloves

item.g:title: Kalk Cartoon Off-Road Jersey - Red / XS
item.g:description: When designing the KALK Off-road Jersey we wanted to provide the most unbeatable lightweight high performance jersey possible. We think we nailed it. item.g:title: Kalk Off-Road Pant - Black / 28
item.g:description: We designed the KALK pants to have the absolute best ventilation you can get, with a cut and stretch designed for fast racing. They are super lightweight, breathable, and have fast-drying materials to keep them feeling breezy and light after hours of riding. Cut large on the knees to accommodate knee pads or knee braces and four-way stretch panels for freedom of movement. Rip-stop nylon high-abrasion seat panels keep you protected from wear. Full-grain leather inner knee panels provide optimal protection and durability.

They are super lightweight, breathable, and have fast-drying materials to keep them feeling breezy and light after hours of riding. Cut large on the knees to accommodate knee pads or knee braces and four-way stretch panels for freedom of movement. Rip-stop nylon high-abrasion seat panels keep you protected from wear. Full-grain leather inner knee panels provide optimal protection and durability.

item.g:title: NO BS Off-Road Gloves - Red / S
item.g:description: When designing the 0 BS gloves we knew what we had to do. A true high performance race glove, feeling like a second skin. No matter what gnarly adventure it was facing. And we did it. When it comes to fast paced racing, these gloves rule them all, 0% BS.
item.g:rich_text_description: <p>When designing the 0 BS gloves we knew what we had to do. A true high performance race glove, feeling like a second skin. No matter what gnarly adventure it was facing. And we did it. When it comes to fast paced racing, these gloves rule them all, 0% BS.</p>

item.g:title: RÖK Off-Road Jersey - Red / XS
item.g:description: The RÖK Dirt Biking Jersey is a high-performance Off-Road jersey designed to be lightweight and extremely quick drying. Laser cut vents allow for extra airflow keeping you dry and fresh the whole ride. Ergonomically cut abrasion resistant arms and shoulders give you max protection and the bonded hems keep the jersey comfortable when tucked into the pants, finished off with a low profile neck to avoid rubbing with neck braces.

item.g:title: RÖK Off-Road Pant - Black / 28
item.g:description: We designed the RÖK pants to be super lightweight and breathable to keep you comfortable even on the hottest of days. Fast drying fabrics together with great ventilation will keep them feeling light the whole ride. The sublimated graphics marry up to the RÖK jersey for the full race look and feel. Cut large on the knees to accommodate knee pads or knee braces, 4 ways stretch panels aid your freedom of movement. Rip stop nylon high abrasion seat panels keep you protected from wear. Full Grain leather inner knee panels to optimal protection and durability.

item.g:title: RÖK Off-Road Gloves - Red / S
item.g:description: The RÖK Glove is a super light “second skin” Off-Road glove, made to challenge high-performance racing. It comes with an ergonomic pre curved palm to prevent bunching and is fully perforated to allow for max air flow. This glove has media friendly stitching on thumb and fingertips for touchscreens. Embossed ergonomically shaped cuff with Velcro adjustment to always keep the gloves securely in place. Mesh panels between fingers aid airflow, with Spandex mesh back of hand fabric that gives protection and freedom of movement at all times. The Skull printed on the fingers is our Unachievable Immortality Ikon. When you see this Skull you know that you have geared up to make history.

item.g:title: Rapp Moto Sock - White / 37-39
item.g:description: We designed Rapp Moto Sock with high performance and colors to go with the rest of our gear. That was easy. Then, we started to look for the best knitting factory around and we ended up discussing with a supplier in Borås, Sweden… At first we didn’t believe them, "are you guys really producing the socks in Sweden?" Yes, they said. Yeah right we said. Well, after our visit to their facility we can see that they are really knitting our Moto socks in Borås, Sweden.WHY IT KICKS ASS:If you want a high-end sock to match your gear, made in Sweden, this is the one.
item.g:rich_text_description:
We designed Rapp Moto Sock with high performance and colors to go with the rest of our gear. That was easy. Then, we started to look for the best knitting factory around and we ended up discussing with a supplier in Borås, Sweden… At first we didn’t believe them, "are you guys really producing the socks in Sweden?" Yes, they said. Yeah right we said. Well, after our visit to their facility we can see that they are really knitting our Moto socks in Borås, Sweden.

WHY IT KICKS ASS:

If you want a high-end sock to match your gear, made in Sweden, this is the one.

item.g:title: Lera Off-Road Jersey - Black / XS
item.g:description: From experience, we know a jersey needs to be able to survive a harsh beating, so, when designing the LERA Jersey, durability was at top of our mind. This Jersey is meant to get dirty; it was made for it. We even named it LERA, - that’s Swedish for mud. The jersey is a premium heavy-duty Off-Road jersey with ergonomically cut abrasion resistant arms and shoulders for maximum protection and laser cut vents to allow extra airflow. Equipped with 4-way stretch mid weight micro mesh body fabric with TPU vinyl logo detail. Bonded hems make the jersey comfortable when tucked into the pants and finished off with a low profile neck to avoid rubbing with neck braces. Sublimated open-eyelet mesh underarms and side body panels to maximize ventilation.

Sublimated open-eyelet mesh underarms and side body panels to maximize ventilation.
item.g:rich_text_description: <div> <div> <p>From experience, we know a jersey needs to be able to survive a harsh beating, so, when designing the LERA Jersey, durability was at top of our mind. This Jersey is meant to get dirty; it was made for it. We even named it LERA, - that’s Swedish for mud. The jersey is a premium heavy-duty Off-Road jersey with ergonomically cut abrasion resistant arms and shoulders for maximum protection and laser cut vents to allow extra airflow. Equipped with 4-way stretch mid weight micro mesh body fabric with TPU vinyl logo detail. Bonded hems make the jersey comfortable when tucked into the pants and finished off with a low profile neck to avoid rubbing with neck braces. Sublimated open-eyelet mesh underarms and side body panels to maximize ventilation.</p> </div> </div>

item.g:title: Lera Off-Road Pant - Black / 28
item.g:description: The LERA pant is a premium heavy-duty Dirt Biking pant made to perform in gnarly terrain. It offers an outstanding pre-curved tailored Race-Fit with a large cut on the knees to accommodate knee pads or knee braces. It has full grain leather inner knee panels for optimal protection and durability. The 4 way stretch panels aid your freedom of movement while the pants are protected from wear thanks to the Rip stop nylon high abrasion seat panels. Equipped with two (2) secure zipped cargo pockets to bring your personal stuff such as phone and car keys, and two (2) zippered vents for extra airflow for the leg.

item.g:title: Lera Off-Road Gloves - Red / S
item.g:description: When designed the LERA Dirt-Biking Glove our goal was a glove that would be reliable and durable enough for the gnarliest rides. Its a heavy-duty Off-Road glove that comes with ergonomic pre curved palm to prevent bunching and fully perforated to allow max air flow. It has double layer in high abrasion areas and a silicon detail of our SKULL Ikon for extra grip. This glove has media friendly stitching on thumb and index fingertips for touchscreens and embossed ergonomically shaped cuff with Velcro adjustment to always keep the gloves securely in place. Full sublimated 4-way stretch back of hand fabric, wicks sweat and quick drying. Mesh panels between fingers to aid the airflow, keeping those paws of yours dry.

item.g:title: Lera Off-Road Jacket - Black / S
item.g:description: The LERA Off-Road Jacket is a premium heavy-duty jacket that has everything you need to be adaptable to wild terrain. It has large, zippered vents which allow you to manage how much airflow you want on the fly or if you are running super-hot, just remove the sleeves to turn the jacket into a vest.

item.g:title: Lite Off-Road Vest - Black / XS
item.g:description: When we designed the Lite Off-Road Vest our vision was something reliable during fast racing and hard Off Road riding. Something that would keep out the wind out and protect you from getting wet without making you overheat when going full-speed. What we came up with really hit the mark.
item.g:rich_text_description: <p>When we designed the Lite Off-Road Vest our vision was something reliable during fast racing and hard Off Road riding. Something that would keep out the wind out and protect you from getting wet without making you overheat when going full-speed. What we came up with really hit the mark.</p>

item.g:title: RÖK Off-Road Pant - Gray / 28
item.g:description: We designed the RÖK pants to be super lightweight and breathable to keep you comfortable even on the hottest of days. Fast drying fabrics together with great ventilation will keep them feeling light the whole ride. The sublimated graphics marry up to the RÖK jersey for the full race look and feel. Cut large on the knees to accommodate knee pads or knee braces, 4 ways stretch panels aid your freedom of movement. Rip stop nylon high abrasion seat panels keep you protected from wear. Full Grain leather inner knee panels to optimal protection and durability.

item.g:title: Spoke MTB Long Sleeve Jersey Men - Men / Asphalt / XS
item.g:description: The SPOKE Jersey is designed for all MTB adventures. It will keep you dry and comfortable both on and off the bike thanks to the very quick drying materials (x4 quicker than cotton!). The SPOKE features a casual look, with kick-ass print featuring a mix of our Anything Buy Mainstream X Ikon and our Racing in Our Veins Flash Ikon.OUR CHOICE OF FABRICIt’s the mix of two different materials that makes SPOKE truly unique. The front has a super quick drying material while the back and upper sleeves have a four way stretch material to allow for extra flexibility and reinforcement to protect you from the branches when you are shredding the trails.WHY IT KICKS ASSOther than then superior performance of the dual material set-up, its one of the best feeling, and best looking MTB jerseys out there. Try it yourself and you will know.
item.g:rich_text_description:
The SPOKE Jersey is designed for all MTB adventures. It will keep you dry and comfortable both on and off the bike thanks to the very quick drying materials (x4 quicker than cotton!). The SPOKE features a casual look, with kick-ass print featuring a mix of our Anything Buy Mainstream X Ikon and our Racing in Our Veins Flash Ikon.

OUR CHOICE OF FABRIC

It’s the mix of two different materials that makes SPOKE truly unique. The front has a super quick drying material while the back and upper sleeves have a four way stretch material to allow for extra flexibility and reinforcement to protect you from the branches when you are shredding the trails.

WHY IT KICKS ASS

Other than then superior performance of the dual material set-up, its one of the best feeling, and best looking MTB jerseys out there. Try it yourself and you will know.

item.g:title: Warm Changing Robe - Black / S-M
item.g:description: We made this robe into a stowable changing robe, small when you fold it, oversized when you wear it. The thin waterproof fabric with taped seems keeps you dry and protected from the wind and rain before and after your big race. The inside of the robe is designed with a comfy microfiber liner that gives you the sensation of a high end microfiber towel. The robe will dry you up after a wet race and keep you warm before the next one.

item.g:title: NORDIC 4L Winter Hydration Pack - Black
item.g:description: The NORDIC 4 is a slim and fast run/ski hydration pack for developed for racing and small adventures when XC-skiing, Running or Mountain biking. The pack deliverers 4 liters of storage, including a 2.0L hydration bladder and our revolutionary Thermo Cell insulation technology that eliminates freezing of the drink tube and bite valve even in the most extreme weather conditions.Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 1.1 + Thermo Cell - our patented 4-point suspension tech for an absolute secure and tight fit.NDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fitThermo Cell - technology to keep your hydration from freezing in cold weather.Lightweight - 4L of total storage for slim and lightweight hydration backpack- 2.0L / 70 oz Hydration bladder included
item.g:rich_text_description:
The NORDIC 4 is a slim and fast run/ski hydration pack for developed for racing and small adventures when XC-skiing, Running or Mountain biking. The pack deliverers 4 liters of storage, including a 2.0L hydration bladder and our revolutionary Thermo Cell insulation technology that eliminates freezing of the drink tube and bite valve even in the most extreme weather conditions.

  • Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 1.1 + Thermo Cell - our patented 4-point suspension tech for an absolute secure and tight fit.
  • NDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit
  • Thermo Cell - technology to keep your hydration from freezing in cold weather.
  • Lightweight - 4L of total storage for slim and lightweight hydration backpack
  • 2.0L / 70 oz Hydration bladder included

item.g:title: NORDIC 10L Winter Hydration Pack - White
item.g:description:
Revolutionary Winter Hydration Backpack for Cross-country Skiing
The NORDIC 10L is the perfect winter run/ski hydration pack that’s developed for the long and cold adventures, when XC-skiing, Running and Mountain biking. item.g:rich_text_description:
Revolutionary Winter Hydration Backpack for Cross-country Skiing

The NORDIC 10L is the perfect winter run/ski hydration pack that’s developed for the long and cold adventures, when XC-skiing, Running and Mountain biking. The pack comes with 10 liters of storage in total, including a 2.0L hydration bladder and our revolutionary Thermo Cell insulation technology that eliminates freezing of the drink tube and bite valve even in the most extreme weather conditions.

  • Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 1.1 + Thermo Cell - our patented 4-point suspension tech for an absolute secure and tight fit.
  • NDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit
  • Thermo Cell - technology to keep your hydration from freezing in cold weather.
  • 10L of total storage - Bring what you need for a long adventure
  • 2.0L / 70 oz Hydration bladder included

item.g:title: POW 16L Winter Protector Pack - White
item.g:description: The POW 16 protector pack will keep you protected while you’re bombing the mountain while having absolutely zero bounce. It’s a supersmooth snowboarding and skiing backpack made for the alpine adventures in high speed and adrenaline. It comes with a CE-Certified full back protector, No Dancing Monkey™ 2.0 + Snug-Me harness system, Thermo Cell insulation technology, ski and snowboard carrier system, and quick access avalanche equipment pocket. In total it’s 16 liters of storage for your personal gear and safety equipment. The POW gives a super-snug and comfortable fit that makes you feel free and safe without cramping your style.Zero bounce with NDM 2.0 + Snug Me - The No Dancing Monkey™ 2.0 harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.Stay protected - Worry less about falling over and more about how to gain speed with the removable Lev.1CE-Certified by SAS-TEC full back protector16L of total storage - With room for a 3L Hydration bladderNDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fitThermo Cell- Technology to keep your hydration from freezing in cold weather.

item.g:rich_text_description:
The POW 16 protector pack will keep you protected while you’re bombing the mountain while having absolutely zero bounce. It’s a supersmooth snowboarding and skiing backpack made for the alpine adventures in high speed and adrenaline. It comes with a CE-Certified full back protector, No Dancing Monkey™ 2.0 + Snug-Me harness system, Thermo Cell insulation technology, ski and snowboard carrier system, and quick access avalanche equipment pocket. In total it’s 16 liters of storage for your personal gear and safety equipment. The POW gives a super-snug and comfortable fit that makes you feel free and safe without cramping your style.

  • Zero bounce with NDM 2.0 + Snug Me - The No Dancing Monkey™ 2.0 harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.
  • Stay protected - Worry less about falling over and more about how to gain speed with the removable Lev.1CE-Certified by SAS-TEC full back protector
  • 16L of total storage - With room for a 3L Hydration bladder
  • NDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit
  • Thermo Cell- Technology to keep your hydration from freezing in cold weather.

- Large main compartment
- Outside compression system for a slim profile

item.g:rich_text_description:
HAJKER is a great waterproof adventure daypack, with a rolltop opening and plenty of smart storage solutions. The pack is made for highspeed activities and is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ 2.1 harness system and waist support belt that makes the pack stay put on your back without cramping your style.

  • Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 2.0 + Snug Me – Harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.
  • NDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit.
  • 2-in-1 - The waist belt can be used on its own, perfect as a lightweight hip-pack for short rides
  • Waterproof – Rolltop opening to keep your gear safe from all kinds of weather.
  • 18L of total storage – fit everything you need for a full day of adventure

item.g:title: HAJKER 24L Rolltop Daypack - Standard / Black
item.g:description: Waterproof hiking daypack for the big adventuresThe HAJKER is the optimal hiking day pack with a big 24L main compartment with a rolltop and an inner dry sack, waterproofing your gear for all kinds of weather. Store the stuff you need quick access to in the two zippered side pockets and compress it all together from the outside to get slimmer profile and a stable backpack that doesn’t bounce when you are out exploring, climbing, or running in the roughest terrain.The waist belt secures the lower part of the backpack and can also be detached and used on its own, like a hip-pack. You also got a helmet carry system that detachable and stored in a pocket when not in use. The pack also comes with an insulated water bladder pouch if you ever want to add a hydration bladder with the pack. Hydration bladder and accessories are not included.

Store the stuff you need quick access to in the two zippered side pockets and compress it all together from the outside to get slimmer profile and a stable backpack that doesn’t bounce when you are out exploring, climbing, or running in the roughest terrain.</p> <p>The waist belt secures the lower part of the backpack and can also be detached and used on its own, like a hip-pack. item.g:title: HAJKER 30L Rolltop Daypack - Black
item.g:description: HAJKER is a great waterproof adventure daypack, with a rolltop opening and plenty of smart storage solutions. The pack is made for highspeed activities and is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ 2.1 harness system and waist support belt that makes the pack stay put on your back without cramping your style.Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 2.0 + Snug Me – Harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.Anti Freeze - Thermo Cell insulation technology uses your body heat to protect the drinking tube from freezing.NDM™ Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit.2-in-1 - The waist belt can be used on its own, perfect as a lightweight hip-pack for short ridesWaterproof – Rolltop opening to keep your gear safe from all kinds of weather.30L of total storage – fit everything you need for a full day of adventure
item.g:rich_text_description:
HAJKER is a great waterproof adventure daypack, with a rolltop opening and plenty of smart storage solutions. The pack is made for highspeed activities and is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ 2.1 harness system and waist support belt that makes the pack stay put on your back without cramping your style.

  • Zero bounce with No Dancing Monkey™ 2.0 + Snug Me – Harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.
  • Anti Freeze - Thermo Cell insulation technology uses your body heat to protect the drinking tube from freezing.
  • NDM™ Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit.
  • 2-in-1 - The waist belt can be used on its own, perfect as a lightweight hip-pack for short rides
  • Waterproof – Rolltop opening to keep your gear safe from all kinds of weather.
  • 30L of total storage – fit everything you need for a full day of adventure

item.g:title: HAJKER Ultra 30L Fastpacking Pack - Blue
item.g:description: The HAJKER ULTRA is the perfect pack if you’re looking for a high-end, low weight adventure pack for high-speed action. The backpack is designed for running with a load of up to 8kg and with the needs of on-the-go access to your essentials. The pack is developed in close cooperation with our adventure racing team and the prototypes are proven in the most grueling endurance races in the world. The features are made with extreme requirements to be perfect for any adventure. NDM 3.0 - Harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.2 Mesh Bottle Pockets - intended for easy access of 2x750 ml bottles on the go.Ultra Lightweight - only 700g in total weight. Several Pockets - plenty of pockets easy to reach while in action
item.g:rich_text_description:
The HAJKER ULTRA is the perfect pack if you’re looking for a high-end, low weight adventure pack for high-speed action. The backpack is designed for running with a load of up to 8kg and with the needs of on-the-go access to your essentials. The pack is developed in close cooperation with our adventure racing team and the prototypes are proven in the most grueling endurance races in the world. The features are made with extreme requirements to be perfect for any adventure.  

  • NDM 3.0 - Harness developed and tested with top athletes to give you the perfect fit with no compromises, with absolutely no bounce.
  • 2 Mesh Bottle Pockets - intended for easy access of 2x750 ml bottles on the go.
  • Ultra Lightweight - only 700g in total weight. 
  • Several Pockets - plenty of pockets easy to reach while in action

item.g:description:
ULTRA-DURABLE 1,0L HYDRATION BLADDER WITHPLUG & PLAY CONNECTION

item.g:title: Shape-Shift Hydration Bladder With Plug-N-Play Coupling - 1.5-2.0L / Plug & Play
item.g:description:
Ultra-Durable 1,5-2,0L Hydration Bladder With Plug & Play Connection
This Shape-Shift hydration system adds a versatile baffle. The baffle can be zipped to slim the bladder profile and unzipped to increase fluid volume or reverse to clean and dry. The patented super-wide slide top opening makes it easy to load up with ice on hot days and turn inside out to clean when your adventure is complete.

item.g:title: Magnetic Tube Clip
item.g:description:
Magnetic Tube Clip That Keep Your Tube In A Secure And Accessible Position
This is a super strong Magnet Tube Clip that will keep your drink tube in a secure and accessible position even on the wildest rides. Easy to hook and attach to the harness of your backpack or at the front of your jersey, depending on what works best for you.

item.g:title: Outlander XC Hydration Pack 2L - Blue
item.g:description: This is a race hydration backpack streamlined to be super light and made for gravel and MTB racing, or fast rides when you value speed over bringing gear. The OUTLANDER 2 XC is geared-up with our award winning patented No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point harness that makes the pack 100% bounce free in action. The unique stretchy harness allows a tight fit but gives that extra freedom to breathe and move.Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspensionOnly the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible, carrying only hydration and a few small necessities.- 1.5L / 50oz Elite Hydration Bladder included with fixed tube coupling
item.g:rich_text_description:

The OUTLANDER 2 XC is geared-up with our award winning patented No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point harness that makes the pack 100% bounce free in action. The unique stretchy harness allows a tight fit but gives that extra freedom to breathe and move.

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension
  • Only the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible, carrying only hydration and a few small necessities.

item.g:description:
ADVENTURE FIT: Fits over the additional bulk of dual sport and adventure riding gear. Designed for those who wear body armor and protective riding jackets, or just bigger riders. Fits chest sizes ranging from 37 - 47" (94 to 120 cm).MOTO HYDRO 8L is the high-end hydration pack for Off-road motorcycle racing and adventure, with the perfect balanced fit for any individual rider. The pack is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 1.2 harness system that makes the pack stay put on your back even in the most gnarly terrain. 8L of storage – Big main compartment, 2 zippered pockets and straps on the outside for jacket or extra gear.

item.g:rich_text_description:
Accessible Gel & Food Rack for the NDM 1 Harness

The Gel Fuel Rack / NDM 1 give the user the ability to reach their gels and similar snacks at any time while our on the trails. The “grab-n-pull” aspect of the rack makes it super fast for you to fuel up with new energy. The attachment is compatible with backpacks equipped with the No Dancing Monkey™ 1.0 and No Dancing Monkey™ 1.2 harnesses.

This product is compatible with the following models:

  • MOTO Hydro
  • MTB Hydro
  • Airborne
  • Ranger
  • Vertical
  • Patriot
  • Outlander (Not compatible with Outlander PRO)

item.g:title: OUTLANDER Moto 2L Hydration Pack - Crazy Yellow
item.g:description:
ULTRALIGHT HYDRATION PACK FOR MOTO
This is a race hydration backpack streamlined to be super light on competitions, or fast rides when you value speed over bringing gear. OUTLANDER 2L MOTO is geared-up with our award winning patented No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point harness that makes the pack 100% bounce free in action. The unique stretchy harness allows a tight fit but gives that extra freedom to breathe and move.Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspensionLightweight and durable - Stay as lightweight as possible, carrying only hydration and a few small necessities.1.5L / 50oz Elite Hydration Bladder with fixed tube coupling included
item.g:rich_text_description:
ULTRALIGHT HYDRATION PACK FOR MOTO

This is a race hydration backpack streamlined to be super light on competitions, or fast rides when you value speed over bringing gear. OUTLANDER 2L MOTO is geared-up with our award winning patented No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point harness that makes the pack 100% bounce free in action. The unique stretchy harness allows a tight fit but gives that extra freedom to breathe and move.

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension

item.g:title: Waist 2L Hip Pack - Red
item.g:description:
Super Lightweight Hip-pack in Splitting Wood Style
WAIST 2L is a special designed waist pack providing the perfect ergonomic fit on your hip. With its banana-shape and single-buckle secure suspension strap, the belt will be fixed on your waist without cramping your style and performance. Slim and smooth with space to carry spare gloves, sharpening stone, small file, snacks and optional hydration bladder.Single-buckle secure suspension strap- Won't affect balance (or style) by staying compressed and snug to your body
Ventilated back panel - better airflow

item.g:title: USWE Flag Bearer Cap
item.g:description:
Customizable snapback cap made to rep your style.
Stand out with a cap that’s more than just headwear—it’s a statement. This snapback is designed for those who want to rep their personality, team, or cause in a way that’s uniquely theirs.Velcro Front Panel: The cap features a discreet Velcro area on the front, giving you the freedom to attach, remove, and swap patches whenever you want.Patch Compatibility: Pair it with our range of woven patches, including national flags, USWE Ikons, and a variety of other designs—so you can mix and match depending on your mood or adventure.Durable Design: Made with high-quality materials that balance structure and comfort, this snapback is built to last whether you’re on the trail, at the gym, or out in the city.Perfect Fit: Adjustable snapback closure ensures a secure and comfortable fit for most head sizes.Personalize your look, showcase your identity, and switch things up whenever the moment calls for it.
item.g:rich_text_description:
Customizable snapback cap made to rep your style.

Stand out with a cap that’s more than just headwear—it’s a statement. This snapback is designed for those who want to rep their personality, team, or cause in a way that’s uniquely theirs.

  • Velcro Front Panel: The cap features a discreet Velcro area on the front, giving you the freedom to attach, remove, and swap patches whenever you want.

  • Patch Compatibility: Pair it with our range of woven patches, including national flags, USWE Ikons, and a variety of other designs—so you can mix and match depending on your mood or adventure.

  • Durable Design: Made with high-quality materials that balance structure and comfort, this snapback is built to last whether you’re on the trail, at the gym, or out in the city.

  • Perfect Fit: Adjustable snapback closure ensures a secure and comfortable fit for most head sizes.

Personalize your look, showcase your identity, and switch things up whenever the moment calls for it.

item.g:title: Dimma Trail Running Shirt Women - Women / Red / XS
item.g:description: The feel of a truly lightweight tee is unbeatable. That’s why we designed this shirt to be as light as fog, hence the name DIMMA (in Swedish it means just that, fog). The pattern takes its inspiration from early morning runs when the fog lies thick, and you’re out giving it all. The Dimma Trail Running Shirt also has the matching DIMMA Trail Running Shorts, making it a complete trail running kit.

item.g:title: Dimma Trail Running Shorts Women - Women / Red / XS
item.g:description: The DIMMA shorts are a super lightweight pair of shorts with built in tights. The tights are super thin with a comfortable feel, making the shorts truly lightweight, quick drying and with minimal risk of chafing. Truly made with long trail running in mind, where you need your gear to be top notch. the name DIMMA means fog in Swedish as the pattern takes its inspiration from early morning runs when the fog lies thick, and you’re out giving it all. The Dimma Trail Running Shorts also has the matching DIMMA Trail Running shirt, making it a complete trail running kit.

item.g:title: Luftig MTB Jersey Women - Women / Black / XS
item.g:description: When we designed the high-performance Luftig MTB Jersey, our focus was to provide a jerseys that would have unbeatable breathability. Trust us when we say that this Jersey really hit the spot, our promise to you is that this jersey will keep you cool the whole day filled with high-speed MTB gravity sessions. It has such an amazing breezy feel to it that we even decided to name it “LUFTIG”, Swedish for “airy”.
item.g:rich_text_description: When we designed the high-performance Luftig MTB Jersey, our focus was to provide a jerseys that would have unbeatable breathability.  Trust us when we say that this Jersey really hit the spot, our promise to you is that this jersey will keep you cool the whole day filled with high-speed MTB gravity sessions. Trust us when we say that this Jersey really hit the spot, our promise to you is that this jersey will keep you cool the whole day filled with high-speed MTB gravity sessions. It has such an amazing breezy feel to it that we even decided to name it “LUFTIG”, Swedish for “airy”.

item.g:title: Skrubb MTB Pants Women - Women / Gray / XS
item.g:description: When you are riding in fast and gnarly terrain, we know your pants needs to be able to take a beating while being comfortable enough to be worn for a full day of riding. That’s why we designed the The Skrubb MTB Pants with all of this in mind, to be able to provide what we think is the absolute perfect MTB Pants. We printed "Anything but Mainstream" on the back, because that's exactly what they are.

item.g:title: Wind Vest Women - Women / Gray / XS
item.g:description: When we designed the Wind Vest our vision was something reliable during fast racing and hard XC MTB or gravel training. Something that would keep out the wind out and protect you from getting wet without making you overheat when going full-speed. What we came up with really hit the mark.
item.g:rich_text_description: <p>When we designed the Wind Vest our vision was something reliable during fast racing and hard XC MTB or gravel training. Something that would keep out the wind out and protect you from getting wet without making you overheat when going full-speed. What we came up with really hit the mark.</p>

item.g:title: Wind Jacket Women - Women / Black / XS
item.g:description: When we designed the Wind Jacket, we knew a true gravel and XC MTB jacket must be breathable and easily packable. The jacket needs to endure any long riders while protecting you against any weather nature can throw at you. And believe us when we say, the Wind Jacket cut no corners.
item.g:rich_text_description: <p>When we designed the Wind Jacket, we knew a true gravel and XC MTB jacket must be breathable and easily packable. The jacket needs to endure any long riders while protecting you against any weather nature can throw at you. And believe us when we say, the Wind Jacket cut no corners.</p>

item.g:title: Vent Gravel Jersey Women - Women / Gray / XS
item.g:description: Our plan was to create a jersey so breathable and ventilated that it would blow your mind, specifically designed for super warm and long gravel or XC MTB rides. What we came up with is what you are looking at right now, the VENT gravel jersey. The most ventilated jersey you ever tried on, hence the name.
item.g:rich_text_description: Our plan was to create a jersey so breathable and ventilated that it would blow your mind, specifically designed for super warm and long gravel or XC MTB rides. What we came up with is what you are looking at right now, the VENT gravel jersey. The most ventilated jersey you ever tried on, hence the name.

item.g:title: Skarp Jersey Women - Women / White / XS
item.g:description: We designed the Skarp Jersey for the riders looking for the absolute best gear to help them cross the finish line. This jersey comes with sleeve length to support the arms and mesh to keep them breathable. The sleeve hems ends with a 45mm silicon elastics printed with the statement that says it all ”X-Anything but Mainstream”. Combine this jersey with the Skarp Bib Shorts for a 100% race look and feel.

item.g:title: Skarp Gravel BIB Shorts Women - Women / Black / XS
item.g:description: The Skarp bib shorts are specifically designed for high-speed XC mountainbike and gravel riding. Its design for a faster positioning on the bike that keeps the experienced rider comfortable all the way to the finish line. When this product was tested by our testing crew they were totally blown away saying things like ”This is by far the best bib shorts I have ever ridden”. Combine the Skarp bib shorts with he Skarp Jersey for a 100% race look and feel.

item.g:title: Grus Gravel Jersey Women - Women / White / XS
item.g:description: The Grus Jersey is made for the fast trails and long gravel roads. The short sleeves with the folded hems and a cut and fit designed for the more upright position makes it ideal for gravel and MTB riding. The design emphasizes the USWE brand as well as the ikons printed tone in tone on the sleeves. The Grus jersey can be combined with any shorts, but matches best with the Grus bib shorts or the Skarp bib shorts.

item.g:title: Grus Gravel Bib Shorts Women - Women / Black / XS
item.g:description: The GRUS bib shorts are specifically designed for mountainbike marathon and gravel riding. The uneven terrain increases the risk of chafing, and the more upright position (compared to road cycling) demands other qualities of the bibs. We covered all this in the GRUS bibs and made them perfect for ”grus", which means gravel in Swedish. The Grus Bib shorts can be combined with any jersey, but matches best with the Grus Jersey or the Skarp Jersey.

We covered all this in the GRUS bibs and made them perfect for ”grus", which means gravel in Swedish. The Grus Bib shorts can be combined with any jersey, but matches best with the Grus Jersey or the Skarp Jersey.

item.g:title: BUDDY 2 Toiletry Bag
item.g:description: A compact 2L toiletry bag designed for smart organization inside your larger Buddy Series packs. Includes internal compartments for smaller items and a built-in mirror for convenience on the go.

item.g:title: Puls Trail Running Shirt Women - Women / Black / XS
item.g:description: When you are going full speed on the trails, with full focus on your great ultra running adventure, you need your gear to be reliable the whole way through. The Minimalistic design of the Puls Trail Running Shirt is super lightweight, durable and has the moisture wicking and breathability to keep your focus on moving forward. Combine this shirt with the Puls Trail Running Shorts Men or the Puls Trail Running Combo Shorts for the best trail running kit.
