item.g:title: Puls Trail Running Shorts Women - Women / Combo Shorts / XS
item.g:description: The Puls trail running shorts comes in a minimalist design with the focus to keep you distraction free on your great ultra running adventures. The soft elastic waistband gives the shorts a snug fit, and features small mesh pockets suitable for gels. The back is equipped with a zippered pocket for your personal "get away car” if things get messy (ie. your credit card or car keys). These shorts don't have any inner mesh construction at all. They are truly minimalistic.

item.g:description: The Puls trail running shorts comes in a minimalist design with the focus to keep you distraction free on your great ultra running adventures. The soft elastic waistband gives the shorts a snug fit, and features small mesh pockets suitable for gels. The back is equipped with a zippered pocket for your personal "get away car” if things get messy (ie. your credit card or car keys). These shorts don't have any inner mesh construction at all. They are truly minimalistic.
item.g:rich_text_description: The Puls trail running shorts comes in a minimalist design with the focus to keep you distraction free on your great ultra running adventures. The soft elastic waistband gives the shorts a snug fit, and features small mesh pockets suitable for gels. They are truly minimalistic.

item.g:title: Puls Trail Running Combo Shorts Women - XS / Women
item.g:description: The Puls Trail Running Combo Shorts is a 2 in 1 short with an outer lightweight shorts and an inner tights. The tights fabric is super soft and comfortable as well as quick drying. All seems are sewn with the softest treads available and the seems are placed with anti chafing in mind. Use them with your preferred underwear or not. The tights are designed with two mesh pockets on the sides. Can be used for extra storage or just for your car keys, wallet, phone, when off the trail, looking causal yet athletic.

item.g:title: Skarp Jersey Men - White / XS
item.g:description: We designed the Skarp Jersey for the riders looking for the absolute best gear to help them cross the finish line. This jersey comes with sleeve length to support the arms and mesh to keep them breathable. The sleeve hems ends with a 45mm silicone elastics printed with the statement that says it all ”X-Anything but Mainstream”. Combine this jersey with the Skarp Bib Shorts for a 100% race look and feel.

item.g:title: OUTLANDER XC 2L Flannel Hydration Pack - Red
item.g:description:
A Pack so Fast Your Can Barely See it
Keeping that hydration close when working the wood on those sweaty days. Our NDM harness guarantees that the pack will stay put when you’re swinging away. Enough room left for some energy gels and snacks to keep you going all day. Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspensionOnly the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible, carrying only hydration and a few small necessities.- 1.5L / 50oz Elite Hydration Bladder included with fixed tube coupling
item.g:rich_text_description:
A Pack so Fast Your Can Barely See it

Keeping that hydration close when working the wood on those sweaty days. Our NDM harness guarantees that the pack will stay put when you’re swinging away. Enough room left for some energy gels and snacks to keep you going all day. 

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.0 harness - Our patented harness system with 4-point performance suspension
  • Only the essentials - Stay as lightweight as possible, carrying only hydration and a few small necessities.
  • 1.5L / 50oz Elite Hydration Bladder included with fixed tube coupling

item.g:title: Podium Hoodie - XS
item.g:description: The USWE Podium Hoodie - the perfect hoodie for when you want to feel fast and sharp. Made with a soft and comfortable blend of 80% cotton and 20% polyester, this hoodie will keep you cozy while you show off your style. The kangaroo pocket is the perfect solution for storing your phone, and the contrast mesh lining in the hood adds an extra touch of detail. The double face drawstring and stretch rib in the sleeve and body ending ensure a perfect fit.This hoodie kick ass! 300g, Oeko-Tex™ Standard 100

The kangaroo pocket is the perfect solution for storing your phone, and the contrast mesh lining in the hood adds an extra touch of detail. The double face drawstring and stretch rib in the sleeve and body ending ensure a perfect fit.

This hoodie kick ass! 

300g, Oeko-Tex™ Standard 100

item.g:title: Berg MTB Jersey Women - Blackened Pearl / XS
item.g:description: The Berg MTB Jersey with its drop tail design will be the perfect fit for any rider going full speed in an aggressive attack mode. The 4-way stretch will give you freedom of movement and the mesh sides will keep you cool so you can keep your speed up for the full session. The Outdoors Undefined Ikon combines the mountains and the forest, representing our playground, the outdoors. At the same time we call it undefined, as we as want to keep exploring new places and new ways. We made this jersey for this reason. Combine with the Skrubb MTB Pants or Skrubb MTB Shorts for a complete MTB gravity set.

item.g:title: Camo 3/4 Jersey Women - Women / Olive Green / XS
item.g:description: The CAMO ¾ looks and feels like a nice casual cotton tee but hidden beneath is a beast of an MTB performance jersey. The super-fast drying material (four times faster than cotton!) will keep you dry and comfortable both on and off the bike, while the low weight and stretch will make you able to perform on point.

item.g:title: Over The Boot Off-Road Pant - 28
item.g:description:
Ride Hard, Stay Comfortable
The OVER BOOT Pants are a high-performance pant with a casual look, with easily adjustable openings to fit over any boot, and comfortable enough to be worn either on the bike or by the campfire. If you want to wear a pant with the outdoor look and still be performing like a superstar, this is it!Reinforced - Durable panels on the knees provide added protectionAll-Condition Comfort - Tested in extreme conditions across every season, designed to keep you comfortable whether you're riding through winter mud or summer heat.Be searchable - equipped with RECCO

item.g:title: USWE Hood - Black / XS
item.g:description: Meet your new favorite hoodie. Designed for comfort, it features a stealthy black-on-black USWE logotype for a clean, understated look. The brushed interior is super soft and insanely cozy, making it your go-to layer for chilly mornings, post-ride hangs, or everyday downtime.

item.g:title: MTB Long Sleeve Jersey Co-Lab - XS
item.g:description:
Limited Edition Co-Lab MTB Jersey
We’ve got truly unique for you this season, a Swedish Co-Lab together with our passionate and award-winning friends at VOID who develops premium cycling apparel. This limited and unique collection features two backpack models + three MTB apparel styles, all covered in VOID’s own unique neutral colored camo pattern. A moisture wicking mountain bike Jersey keeping you dry on the offroad adventures.- Looser fit for a comfortable ride

Limited Edition Co-Lab MTB Jersey

item.g:title: Moto Hydro 8L Kurt Caselli Edition - Black
item.g:description:
Enduro and Hydration Backpack
MOTO HYDRO 8L Kurt Caselli Edition is the high-end hydration pack for Enduro/Off-road motorcycle racing and adventure, with the perfect balanced fit for any individual rider. The pack is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 1.2 harness system that makes the pack stay put on your back even in the most gnarly terrain. The unique elastic harness system allows you a tight fit but gives that extra freedom to breathe and move.Zero bounce with NDM 1.2 harness -Equipped with our patented No Dancing Monkey™ 1.2 harness system with the NDM buckle for absolutely zero bounceNDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit3.0L / 100oz Elite - Hydration Bladder included8L of storage - Big main compartment, 2 zippered pockets and straps on the outside for jacket or extra gear.
item.g:rich_text_description:
Enduro and Hydration Backpack

MOTO HYDRO 8L Kurt Caselli Edition is the high-end hydration pack for Enduro/Off-road motorcycle racing and adventure, with the perfect balanced fit for any individual rider. The pack is equipped with our bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ (NDM) 1.2 harness system that makes the pack stay put on your back even in the most gnarly terrain. The unique elastic harness system allows you a tight fit but gives that extra freedom to breathe and move.

  • Zero bounce with NDM 1.2 harness -Equipped with our patented No Dancing Monkey™ 1.2 harness system with the NDM buckle for absolutely zero bounce
  • NDM Buckle - Technical buckle for a more secure closure and a better fit
  • 3.0L / 100oz Elite - Hydration Bladder included
  • 8L of storage - Big main compartment, 2 zippered pockets and straps on the outside for jacket or extra gear.

item.g:title: Spoke MTB Long Sleeve Jersey Women - Women / Asphalt / XS
item.g:description: The SPOKE Jersey is designed for all MTB adventures. It will keep you dry and comfortable both on and off the bike thanks to the very quick drying materials (x4 quicker than cotton!). The SPOKE features a casual look, with kick-ass print featuring a mix of our Anything Buy Mainstream X Ikon and our Racing in Our Veins Flash Ikon.OUR CHOICE OF FABRICIt’s the mix of two different materials that makes SPOKE truly unique. The front has a super quick drying material while the back and upper sleeves have a four way stretch material to allow for extra flexibility and reinforcement to protect you from the branches when you are shredding the trails.WHY IT KICKS ASSOther than then superior performance of the dual material set-up, its one of the best feeling, and best looking MTB jerseys out there. Try it yourself and you will know.
item.g:rich_text_description:
The SPOKE Jersey is designed for all MTB adventures. It will keep you dry and comfortable both on and off the bike thanks to the very quick drying materials (x4 quicker than cotton!). The SPOKE features a casual look, with kick-ass print featuring a mix of our Anything Buy Mainstream X Ikon and our Racing in Our Veins Flash Ikon.

OUR CHOICE OF FABRIC

It’s the mix of two different materials that makes SPOKE truly unique. The front has a super quick drying material while the back and upper sleeves have a four way stretch material to allow for extra flexibility and reinforcement to protect you from the branches when you are shredding the trails.

WHY IT KICKS ASS

Other than then superior performance of the dual material set-up, its one of the best feeling, and best looking MTB jerseys out there. Try it yourself and you will know.

item.g:title: PACE 14L Trail Running Vest - Red / XS
item.g:description: The PACE 14L is the trail running vest developed to challenge the big ultras offering supreme front and rear accessibility while in action. The body of this lightweight vest is built from the original No Dancing Monkey™ Vest technology including the elastic side panels that makes the vest bounce free and secure even in the most gnarly terrain.Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vestElastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit.Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks (included), plus room for large 2.0L hydration bladder in the back.A large total capacity of 14L with a compartment on the back.
item.g:rich_text_description:
The PACE 14L is the trail running vest developed to challenge the big ultras offering supreme front and rear accessibility while in action. The body of this lightweight vest is built from the original No Dancing Monkey™ Vest technology including the elastic side panels that makes the vest bounce free and secure even in the most gnarly terrain.

  • Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vest
  • Elastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit.
  • Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks (included), plus room for large 2.0L hydration bladder in the back.
  • A large total capacity of 14L with a compartment on the back.

It’s a lightweight vest with an outstanding personal individual fit delivered by the bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ Vest system and the elastic side panels.Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vestElastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit.- Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks (included)
- Total capacity of 8L with a compartment on the back
item.g:rich_text_description:
The PACE 8 trail running hydration vest has a completely new ergonomic design and size range that takes this vest to the next top level. It’s a lightweight vest with an outstanding personal individual fit delivered by the bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ Vest system and the elastic side panels.

  • Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vest
  • Elastic side panels that expand along with the chest during physical exertion, allowing a constant tight and compliant fit.
  • Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks (included)
  • Total capacity of 8L with a compartment on the back

item.g:rich_text_description:
The PACE 2 running hydration vest has an ergonomic design and size range that takes this vest to the top level. It’s a lightweight vest with an outstanding personal fit delivered by the bounce free No Dancing Monkey™ Vest system and the elastic side panels.

  • Zero bounce while running with No Dancing Monkey™ 4-point suspension vest

  • No sweat with the super ventilated mesh back panel
  • Use the vest as a running hydration pack, carrying up to two 500ml ultraflasks

item.g:title: ZULO 2L Hydration Waist Pack Outlet - Crazy Yellow
item.g:description:
ZULO 2 is a special designed race hydration waist pack providing the perfect ergonomic fit on your hip. With its banana-shape and single-buckle secure suspension strap, the belt will be fixed on your waist without cramping your style and performance. It’s equipped with a 1.0L/35oz Elite bladder with Plug-N-Play coupling, magnetic clip for the drink tube, smart multi organizer pocket and two quick stash side pockets for quick access to energy gels and food.Single-buckle secure suspension strap- Won't affect balance (or style) by staying compressed and snug to your body
1.0L Elite Hydration Bladder - with magnetic clip for the drinking tubeVentilated back panel - better airflow
item.g:rich_text_description:
ZULO 2 is a special designed race hydration waist pack providing the perfect ergonomic fit on your hip. With its banana-shape and single-buckle secure suspension strap, the belt will be fixed on your waist without cramping your style and performance. It’s equipped with a 1.0L/35oz Elite bladder with Plug-N-Play coupling, magnetic clip for the drink tube, smart multi organizer pocket and two quick stash side pockets for quick access to energy gels and food.

  • Single-buckle secure suspension strap
  • Won't affect balance (or style) by staying compressed and snug to your body
  • 1.0L Elite Hydration Bladder - with magnetic clip for the drinking tube
  • Ventilated back panel - better airflow

item.g:title: Frame Bag Small Bikepacking Bag - Black / Small
item.g:description: The aerodynamic design fits most frames and comes with three elastic rubber-like straps, inspired by Giant Loop (USWE sister brand) motorcycle luggage and the world of bike packing nerds, and three velcro straps, to ensure the bag sits tight and secure on the bike.
item.g:rich_text_description: <p>The aerodynamic design fits most frames and comes with three elastic rubber-like straps, inspired by Giant Loop (USWE sister brand) motorcycle luggage and the world of bike packing nerds, and three velcro straps, to ensure the bag sits tight and secure on the bike.</p>
